panels.description:
Global statistics from the chain, all nodes that are caught up should have the same value.

If value goes below 80 it is concerning. if it goes below 72 it is a very bad.

It cannot go below 67%, because chain stops otherwise, and there is no data to show then.

targets.expr: velor_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/velor_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Participating voting power % in last 100 rounds

panels.description: Proposal failure rate in leader election window. Value goes back to 0 once node is not asked to propose at all in the window

targets.expr: count(velor_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} > 0)

count(velor_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} <= 0)

100 * sum(velor_consensus_committed_failed_rounds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}) / (sum(velor_consensus_committed_failed_rounds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}) + sum(velor_consensus_committed_blocks_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}))

panels.title: #nodes proposing perfectly within reputation window

targets.expr:
count(
    max by (kubernetes_pod_name,role) (velor_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"})  
    - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) max by (kubernetes_pod_name,role) (velor_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"telemetry-service",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", type="synced"})
     > 30000
)  OR on() vector(0)

velor_state_sync_version{type="synced", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.description: The current round consensus is at, the rate of this is roughly Committed blocks per sec.

targets.expr: velor_consensus_current_round{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Current Round

panels.description: The current epoch number the node is in, the number is bumped with reconfiguration event like key rotation, validator set change etc.

targets.expr: velor_consensus_epoch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Current Epoch

panels.description: The rate of the committed transaction version.

targets.expr: quantile(0.5, rate(velor_consensus_last_committed_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Committed successful txns per sec

panels.description: The average number of transactions of a block, can impact the execution time and overall latency.

targets.expr: rate(velor_consensus_num_txns_per_block_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(velor_consensus_num_txns_per_block_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Transactions per block

panels.description: The rate of the committed round number.

targets.expr: rate(velor_consensus_last_committed_round{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Committed blocks per sec

panels.description: Average size of consensus blocks pulled from mempool

targets.expr: rate(velor_mempool_service_transactions_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", type="get_block", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(velor_mempool_service_transactions_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", type="get_block", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: User transactions per block (by proposer)

panels.description: Average size in bytes of consensus blocks pulled from mempool

targets.expr: rate(velor_mempool_service_bytes_get_block_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(velor_mempool_service_bytes_get_block_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Bytes per block (by proposer)

panels.description: Pending blocks in the block tree.

targets.expr: velor_consensus_num_blocks_in_tree{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} - 1

panels.title: Pending blocks

panels.description: Average size of consensus blocks pulled from mempool

targets.expr: rate(quorum_store_block_size_when_pull_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(quorum_store_block_size_when_pull_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: QS User transactions per block (by proposer)

panels.description: Average size in bytes of consensus blocks pulled from mempool

targets.expr: rate(quorum_store_block_bytes_when_pull_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(quorum_store_block_bytes_when_pull_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: QS Bytes per block (by proposer)

targets.expr: avg(rate(velor_chain_health_backoff_triggered_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(velor_chain_health_backoff_triggered_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg(rate(velor_wait_for_full_blocks_triggered_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(velor_wait_for_full_blocks_triggered_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg(rate(quorum_store_backpressure_txn_count_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(quorum_store_backpressure_txn_count_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg(rate(quorum_store_backpressure_proof_count_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(quorum_store_backpressure_proof_count_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg(rate(velor_consensus_backpressure_on_proposal_triggered_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(velor_consensus_backpressure_on_proposal_triggered_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg(rate(velor_pipeline_backpressure_on_proposal_triggered_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(velor_pipeline_backpressure_on_proposal_triggered_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Rate of inserted transactions per ranking score bucket

targets.expr: max by (role, bucket) (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_ranking_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="insert"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Inserted transactions by gas price bucket

panels.description: Rate of consensus pulled transactions per ranking score bucket

targets.expr: sum by (role, bucket) (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_ranking_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="consensus_pulled"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Transactions pulled by gas price bucket

panels.description: The time between Mempool receiving the transaction and time to be committed.

targets.expr: sum by (role, scope, bucket, submitted_by) (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval])) / sum by (role, scope, bucket, submitted_by) (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Per Bucket Avg E2E Txn Commit Latency

panels.description: Rate of consensus committed transactions per ranking score bucket

targets.expr: sum by (role, bucket) (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_ranking_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="remove", status="commit_accepted"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Transactions committed by gas price bucket

panels.description: Rate of consensus rejected transactions per ranking score bucket

targets.expr: sum by (role, bucket) (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_ranking_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="remove", status="commit_rejected"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Transactions rejected by gas price bucket

panels.description:
Data on PFN nodes only. Unless clients send duplicate transactions, this is a reliable way to see E2E latency.

The time between Mempool receiving the transaction and time to be committed.

targets.expr: sum by (bucket, submitted_by) (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval])) / sum by (bucket, submitted_by) (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source="vmagent", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"pfn.*", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Velor PFN-only Per Bucket Avg E2E Txn Commit Latency

panels.description: Rate of consensus expired transactions per ranking score bucket

targets.expr: sum by (role) (rate(velor_core_mempool_gc_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", type="client_expiration", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Transactions expired

targets.expr: sum by (role) (rate(velor_core_mempool_gc_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", type="client_expiration",}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (role) (rate(velor_core_mempool_removed_txns_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Participating in consensus in leader election window (either voted in last num_validators rounds, or proposed in last 10*num_validators rounds)

targets.expr: max by (kubernetes_pod_name) (clamp_max(velor_committed_votes_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"} + velor_committed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"}, 1))

panels.title: Participating in consensus

panels.description: Proposal failure rate in leader election window. Value goes back to 0 once node is not asked to propose at all in the window

targets.expr: velor_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} / clamp_min(velor_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} + velor_committed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}, 1)

panels.title: Proposal failure rate

panels.description: Proposal failure rate in leader election window. Value goes back to 0 once node is not asked to propose at all in the window

targets.expr: velor_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Proposal failure count (in window)

panels.description: Voting power of all votes for the same ledger info collected by a proposer

targets.expr: rate(velor_proposer_collected_most_voting_power_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/rate(velor_proposer_collecting_round_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/velor_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: collected voting power for proposal

panels.description: Voting power of all votes for all other (conflicting) ledger infos collected by a proposer

targets.expr: rate(velor_proposer_collected_conflicting_voting_power_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/rate(velor_proposer_collecting_round_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/velor_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: collected voting power for conflicting

panels.description: Voting power of timeout votes collected by a proposer

targets.expr: rate(velor_proposer_collected_timeout_voting_power_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/rate(velor_proposer_collecting_round_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/velor_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: collected voting power for timeout votes

panels.description:
Global statistics from the chain, all nodes that are caught up should have the same value.

If value goes below 80 it is concerning. if it goes below 72 it is a very bad.

It cannot go below 67%, because chain stops otherwise, and there is no data to show then.

targets.expr: quantile(0.5, velor_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_10_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/velor_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, velor_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_30_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/velor_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, velor_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/velor_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, velor_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_300_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/velor_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

panels.title: Participating voting power % in consensus

panels.description:
Global statistics from the chain, all nodes that are caught up should have the same value.

If value goes below 80 it is concerning. if it goes below 72 it is a very bad.

It cannot go below 67%, because chain stops otherwise, and there is no data to show then.

targets.expr: quantile(0.5, velor_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_10_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/velor_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, velor_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_30_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/velor_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, velor_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/velor_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, velor_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_300_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/velor_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

panels.title: Participating nodes % in consensus

panels.description: Proposal failure rate in leader election window. Value goes back to 0 once node is not asked to propose at all in the window

targets.expr: velor_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Average proposal failure count (in window)

targets.expr: quantile by (peer_id) (0.5, velor_consensus_participation_status{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"})

panels.description:
If value goes below 80 it is concerning. if it goes below 72 it is a very bad.

It cannot go below 67%, because chain stops otherwise, and there is no data to show then.

targets.expr: avg_over_time(quantile by (peer_id) (0.5, velor_consensus_participation_status{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"})[10m]) <1

panels.title: Consensus participation over 10m (non 100%)

panels.description:
If value goes below 80 it is concerning. if it goes below 72 it is a very bad.

It cannot go below 67%, because chain stops otherwise, and there is no data to show then.

targets.expr: avg_over_time(quantile by (peer_id) (0.5, velor_consensus_participation_status{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"})[1h]) <1

panels.title: Consensus participation over 1h (non 100%)

panels.description: When chain is halted, in order for chain to continue to the next round, we need to reach 1 for the timeout votes.

targets.expr: 100 * sum(max by (peer_id) (velor_consensus_current_round_timeout_voted_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"})) / max(velor_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"})

panels.title: % of voting power voted for timeout in the current round

panels.description:
When chain is halted, in order for chain to continue to the next round, we need to reach 1 for the timeout votes.

When there is a fork, looking at per-node chart is more useful.

targets.expr:
100 * max by (kubernetes_pod_name) (sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, run_uuid) (velor_consensus_current_round_timeout_voted_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"})) 

/ 

max by (kubernetes_pod_name) (velor_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"})

panels.title: By peer (fork view): % of voting power voted for timeout in the current round

panels.description: for each node, how stale it's consensus participation is. Doesn't show values, if node is not participating in current epoch.

targets.expr: max (velor_consensus_last_voted_epoch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"} * 100000 + velor_consensus_last_voted_round{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"}) - max by (peer_id) (velor_consensus_last_voted_epoch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"} * 100000 + velor_consensus_last_voted_round{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"}) < 70000

panels.title: (current round - last voted round), for each node

panels.description: In the current (halted) round, amount of votes collected for the proposal. Hash_index represents each of the proposals - there should be only one proposal, but malicious actors (or nodes with incorrect event history/leader election) can create multiple proposals

targets.expr: 100 * sum by (hash_index) (max by (peer_id, hash_index) (velor_consensus_current_round_voted_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"})) / max(velor_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"})

panels.title: % of voting power voted for (each of) the proposal(s)

panels.description: The current round consensus is at, the rate of this is roughly Committed blocks per sec.

targets.expr: velor_consensus_current_round{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Current Round

panels.description: The duration of a single round until it generates local timeout.

targets.expr: velor_consensus_round_timeout_s{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Current Round timeout value

panels.description: The total number of rounds that have timeout certificate.

targets.expr: rate(velor_consensus_timeout_rounds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.title: Timeout rounds per sec

panels.description: Number of validators for the current epoch.

targets.expr: velor_consensus_current_epoch_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Number of validators

panels.description: Total voting power of the current epoch.

targets.expr: velor_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Total voting power

panels.description: Pending blocks in the block tree.

targets.expr: velor_consensus_num_blocks_in_tree{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} - 1

panels.title: Pending blocks

panels.description: Pending blocks in the pipeline

targets.expr: velor_consensus_num_blocks_in_pipeline{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Pending blocks in pipeline

targets.expr: consensus_gauge{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", op="back_pressure"}

panels.description: The proposal rate of the node, indicating how many times it becomes leaders.

targets.expr: rate(velor_consensus_proposals_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Proposals rate

panels.description: The total number the node votes on a NIL block when the round timeout. (when the proposer doesn't send proposal in time).

targets.expr: rate(velor_consensus_vote_nil_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.title: Nil block per sec

targets.expr: sum(rate(velor_chain_health_backoff_triggered{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]))
